description:
Flint is one beautiful dude! He's sexy, adorable, cute, and cool all rolled into one.
He's just 18, and he's got that fine little bit of peach fuzz on his chest that shows he's on the cusp of being man.
His attitude is chill and easy-going, confident without being full of himself.
Flint was super easy to work with. Great at posing and he basically would brush his hand across his dick and it would spring to life. The boy has got an amazing backside too, that apparently the girls go nuts over.
Gorgeous green/amber eyes, full lush lips and near perfect teeth.
He's a total package. Didn't get any real feel if he will be back to do more, so enjoy him now. But I will of course see if he might be persuaded into at least being Serviced.
title: Flint - Solo
